text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 12 and 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Wolfram Müller ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Ivan Heshko ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Sergio Gallardo ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
